TEXT.S:
iga-maydih kaku kakapahan kisu,2016 - (Me Before You), 2016
nilacul u lacul nu iga militemuh kami i zazan nu uzip nu mita,
haca cacay katenes ku demiad,
alawhani kanca masubelidayku cucuk nu balucu'.
siwkay nu Amilika (Amilika a kamu)Some encounters in life are destined to end in a hurry, but they always leave behind something that lasts. uyniyan a iga sa, u kanamuhan a iga nu acawa aku i 2016 a mihcan, 2016 mazateng kaku sa, miladay tu kaput nu maku tayza miazih,
matawa sa atu muwangic kami,
nataluma'henay sa, tayza tu micakay ku CD, mitengil tuway i luma'.
nazikuzan sa maazih kayadah i tilibi.
u tatama-sitatungusay-palawayci Wil, naci Sam Claflin mipalaw, Sam Claflin ibalu nu iga, u maadada' caaytu saungayay a tatama, nay talibahalay a kawaw.
nuyaan u makademecay a tademaw ciniza,
nazikuzan talibahalay a kawaw saan, inayi' tu ku nabalucu'an nu uzip niza,
uyzasa ciama atu ina niza ahebed ku balucu',
sapatukil ciniza tu ama atu ina niza, sululen pangkiw ku mihcan a demiad,
miliyaw mizateng haw tu lihalay-sakapatay.
uyniyan a demiad,
malitemuh ciniza tu tatayna- sitatungusay-palawayLouisa, namapalaw ci Emilia Clarke. Emilia ClarkeLouisa ci Louisa, u lipahaktaniktika tatayna. Louisa manunengay a kaying ciniza,
sakamidiput tu lalumaay sa, paales ku nizateng niza,
miliwan i niyazu'.
uyniyan a iga, musakamu pakatineng palatuh kami,
haca maliyas ku kanamuhan a tademaw tu kami,
uyzasa, izawtu ku idih nuheni.
u kawaw nu mita sa,
aminanam kami ahican ladayan ku cucuk nu balucu' nuheni i uzip nu mita,
matalulay sakapahen tulisen pauzip.
